column5: The Blue Bungalow is a great Cape Cod style home located in OLD TOWN Port Aransas, just a 5-7 minute walk to the beach. Out door shower, small dog okay. Updated kitchen laundry and interior, with top notch decor and family friendly spaces! Big yard. City of Port Aransas Reg.#184385
column8: Blue Bungalow, 2 BR Beach House, Walk to the beach
